Trenton.Lawrenceville School:
The Lawrenceville School is a coeducational, independent college preparatory boarding school for students in ninth through twelfth grades including a post-graduate year as well. The school is located on 700 acres (2.8 km2) in the historic Lawrenceville section of Lawrence, in Mercer County, New Jersey, United States.
Lawrenceville is a member of the Eight Schools Association, begun informally in 1973–74 and formalized in 2006.
